uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class MultiTheme

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Theme
        |
        +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.MultiTheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, FilterChangedListener, HighlightChangedListener, HighlightPositionChangedListener, LayerChangedListener, SelectionChangedListener, SelectionPositionChangedListener, SelectionRegionChangedListener, java.io.Serializable, ShaderChangedListener
public class MultiTheme
extends Theme

an experimental class to hold multiple layers in a single theme. Layers are drawn in the order they are added. Other than painting this object behaves as a theme with the first layer being used for highlighting/selection etc. Feel free to modify this behaviour if you need.

Ian

See Also:
